Sentencas: Nanocrystalline ceria (CeO(2)) films were deposited from aqueous solution at 50 degrees C on porous composite anodes of a commercial solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Cerium Oxide Thin Films on Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anodes

Sentencas: The anodes were coated in as-received condition, or after pretreatment with either dodecanethiol or with bromoundecyltrichlorosilane followed by in-situ transformations to a sulfonate-functionalized surface.
Titulo: Cerium Oxide Thin Films on Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anodes

Sentencas: Regardless of pretreatment, the deposition process coated the pore walls throughout the 40-mu m-thick anode.
Titulo: Cerium Oxide Thin Films on Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anodes

Sentencas: The morphology of the coating depended on the type of surface treatment.
Titulo: Cerium Oxide Thin Films on Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anodes

Sentencas: The sulfonate pretreatment yielded the most continuous and uniform films, typically 100 nm thick after 48 h of deposition.
Titulo: Cerium Oxide Thin Films on Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anodes

Sentencas: The thiol pretreatment yielded discontinuous coatings of finely dispersed ceria particles.
Titulo: Cerium Oxide Thin Films on Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anodes

Sentencas: The ceria coatings on as-received anodes were intermediate in thickness, uniformity, and continuity between those on the sulfonate-and thiol-treated anodes.
Titulo: Cerium Oxide Thin Films on Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anodes

Sentencas: The microstructures of the anodes (coated and uncoated) after reduction at 900 degrees C in hydrogen also depended on the type of surface treatment.
Titulo: Cerium Oxide Thin Films on Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anodes

Sentencas: After reduction, the coatings on the sulfonate-treated anode and on the anode without surfactant pretreatment yielded thin, lacey or fissured shells surrounding the nickel network in the porous cermet anode.
Titulo: Cerium Oxide Thin Films on Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anodes
